com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context

Class AbstractContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.AbstractContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InfinitumContext, BeanProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XmlApplicationContext

    public abstract class AbstractContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements InfinitumContext, BeanProvider

    Abstract implementation of InfinitumContext representing a root "parent" context.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/11/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
